page.title: 04PAINS HILL PARK COBHAM SY.
page.content:
2. What is the dispute about the car park?
The Park needs money from tourists to continue its work. The authorities have asked for permission to build a car park on Matthew Arnold meadow and the cricket ground. Cobham Cricket Club would have to move elsewhere. The Park authorities claim that these areas are the only ones that Surrey County Council will not say 'no' to.Some local people claim that the car park would mean increased noise and loss of the rural atmosphere. At present the dispute is at stalemate.
Some Feltonfleet School boys have been working in the Park: excavating the floor of the Turkish Tent.
